title: U.S. household expenditure on slipcovers and decorative pillows 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 4.32 was reached at Year 2015
The lowest Average annual expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 3.65 was reported at Year 2016
